fire_split_run[source]

fire_split_run(input_path:"Directory with tif files", output_path:"Directory to save outputs", interval_days:"Number of days to keep as same event"=16, interval_pixels:"Number of n x n buffer pixels"=8, min_size_pixels:"Ignore fires smaller than this"=1, save_tif:"Save output as tif"=True, save_shape:"Save output as shapefile"=True)

{% endraw %}
